website_summaries.verdict: A unique lamp with a fantastically large light panel.
pros: A LED lamp with multiple lighting modes
Great for general lighting and specific tasks
cons: No stand-out features other than the light panel and USB port

customer_reviews.title: Overall these are excellent lights, particularly since the more flexible versions are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps to support my web-ex conferences with clients. They are well built, bright and adjustable. They provide solid and even illumination. You can adjust the intensity/brightness of the light, as well as the temperature of the LED lit to suit your needs.The arms and hinges of the stand allow for much alignment; however, they do not ave 360 degree rotation at their articulation points so the movement is somewhat limited. Overall these are excellent lights, particularly since the more flexible versions are considerably more expensive. I'm pleased with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Andonian

customer_reviews.title: Great for lighting desktop video conferencing
customer_reviews.text: I use this to light me while I am on camera during desktop video conferences. It is tall enough,when fully upright, to sit behind and above my 27" monitor. It lights me very well. I use it at about 60% brightness and use the night light feature often when the room is really dark.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ebert

customer_reviews.title: It's not as bright as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light so I could show up better in video calls. I sit in front of a window with tinting, so it's not SUPER bright behind me, but it's enough to make me very dark while on calls. This light does an OKAY job when it's 2 feet away. I like that i can adjust the color temp... but it's not quite as bright as they made it seem.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Lamp. Versatile, position adjustable, hue adjustable, brightness adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I video conference from my iPad and I found that lighting makes a great difference in the video. (Face, body, holding a product, etc.) With this lamp I was able to adjust the light to the best angle, brightness and hue for my conferencing. It has a heavy base so no matter how I position the lamp screen it will not tip over. The controls are very easy to manipulate to get the best light for whatever project you are doing. I can see this lamp working great for any use (writing on a paper tablet, reading a book, working on a project, etc.). I highly recommend this desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard J. Cecchettini

customer_reviews.title: A nice sleek & lightweight desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek lamp that does what lamps do best—provide light. I like the warm light and cool light features. This can be used as great backlighting during zoom calls—just makes sure to dim the light a little so you don’t look like the sun. Great lightweight lamp. Has spot to charge devices. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A Lady on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Nice desktop lamp
customer_reviews.text: Have had the lamp since September 2015 and still going strong. Just a few minor issues. One is it's a dust magnet and will need frequent cleaning, especially the shiny base. The lamp is all black. The second you can't adjust the lamp to all positions. The base is not heavy enough and the lamp will tip over in some positions. There's no problem if the position is what one would normally use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: There are no instructions on setting - trial and error
customer_reviews.text: There are two modes - book reading and coffee cup. Book reading is a bluer/white light for reading and coffee cup is more yellow. Do either of those descriptions define exactly what the function are? No, and that's my only problem with this light. There are no detailed instructions regarding mode and use. Yes I figured it out (I guess) but how about a well written users manual?
customer_reviews.author: GLiquorAmerican

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful lamp, but it tends to short out.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, which is why I purchased a second one not even a year after the first one shorted out. Within the first few hours of connecting the second one to power, it had already begun to randomly turn itself off. I have not found a rhyme or reason to why it shorts out or turns itself off. It doesn't seem to get hot, so I'm not sure. If that didn't happen, this lamp would 100% get 5 stars, because it is incredibly versatile and perfect for working from home online activities.
customer_reviews.author: lasaventurasdeandrea

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best desk lamp I have ever owned. Easy to see the on switch in the dark. You can basically direct the light any direction, it has 3 pivots points. It has 3 different shades of light, I only use one. The diffuser is wonderful. Most lamps you have to keep pointed away or down so the rim blocks all direct light from hitting your eyes. With this lamp you have a lot more freedom since the diffuser makes it much easier on the eyes. I am very picky when it comes to setting up my work desk just right and this lamp exceeded my expectations by far.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Xcellent Desk or Bedside Lighting!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm impressed with this desk lamp!! Has many settings of different types of light stream. Big, flat panel of light source for reading, morning coffee, night light and just any 'mood' light. Looks good with that industrial look. Frame adjustable to many situations. Even has a U S B port on left side for charging or as a plug in. I have my Go Hand wood block desk clock plugged in rather than use the batteries. I've had this product for 2 weeks but hard to imagine it failing in any manner. Totally satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wheel Of The Dharma

customer_reviews.title: It emits a high pitch noise
customer_reviews.text: It works great and as described. However, it emits a high pitched noise that gives me a headache after a while. So I can't use it anymore on my work desk because of it.
customer_reviews.author: EDS XXX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for  Roll Top Desks.
customer_reviews.text: This desktop lamp is sturdy, agile and has all the light settings that are needed. We have been searching for two years for a Desktop Lamp that will work with a roll top desk and still allow it be be closed. This one is perfect. The angle adjustment makes this so perfect for lighting the keyboard of the lap top as well as providing reading quality light for the materials on both sides of the desk. Quality Construction; Multiple light settings including a night light; What is not to like about this?
customer_reviews.author: Cosmopolitan Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Articulating LED Warm Light Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: WOW. Excellent lamp. Stylish, very flexible in terms of positioning and love that it can change color temp as well as brightness. Perfectly size, not ginormous, this is perfect on my computer desk at work. The light panel looks like a Cinema 4D area light! Because it's fully articulated (unlike other LED desk lamps) I can lower the lamp head below my eye line so there is no glare. I also like the vibrating feedback when you've reached the max on the touch sensor controls. Nice touch. GREAT DESIGN.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes Shoppin’ Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. Very happy and content with the quality and features of this LED Desk lamp. I found that aiming the panel up to the ceiling and wall area provides great illumination to my work area and room as well. Good features include the adjustments of brightness and warmth of light, quick night light setting, and the USB charger is very nice added convenience. Modern styling. The Arms and panel are poly-resin (plastic) but seem to be strong and sturdy with a nice flat to semi gloss finish. Side note the Lamp is store very well for shipping in it's original box.
customer_reviews.author: Hitech

customer_reviews.title: The best led desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: So versatile and flexible. The lamp will vibrate to let you know once you reach the min or max setting of each function. I love how flexible the lamp is. Firm base. With the rotating arms and light panel, you can put the light wherever you want on a desk. It has a night light function. There are two controls that increase or decrease the brightness of the light. This desk lamp looks extremely elegant and totally high tech. It has a convenient USB port, its nice to plug in my phone when sitting at my computer.
customer_reviews.author: olmo32

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this lamp. It works as advertised, with no glare. Dimmers on LED lamps are pretty standard, but this is the only LED lamp I have ever seen that also lets you adjust the color temperature, and that works just fine also - from a tungsten-like 2700K to a brighter 6500K. The lamp is of solid construction, and a fashion statement in its own right. Some other reviews have noted this lamp is not as bright as a fluorescent would be. I believe that's correct, but I don't like bright lights anyway so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Interstitialist

customer_reviews.title: Great light - especially for lighting artwork!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this light.... I don't use it as a desk light, but instead as a light to illuminate artwork. great thing is that the color rendering of the artwork can be fine-tuned unlike with other picture lights that are much more expensive. would love for it to have a battery inside so it would be rechargeable and never require an outlet.... would also love a short, stout version with a wider light bar so that I could keep it closer to the dresser, but those are suggestions for the next version of the product....
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light.  Construction is so so.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good light. I use in next to my large monitor for task lighting. It is also a good back light when doing a Skype call with my Logitech video conferencing camera. The one down side to the light is that the hinges are flimsy and it's difficult to get the light in a position other than pointing downward. The upper arm especially is not very strong. The light is made from plastic so over time the hinges get looser.
customer_reviews.author: Erik B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp with both cool and warm light.
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance and works flawlessly. I especially appreciate the ability to switch between warm and cool light. I deducted a point for some imperfections in the finish of the arm - really just a few little bumps and light colored smears in the finish. I can certainly live with these, because overall the light is quite attractive & I'm not sure most people would take notice. (These were minor manufacturing imperfections, definitely not shipping damage.) However, I liked the lamp so much that I've ordered a second for another desk.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Great for video conference lighting!
customer_reviews.text: I put one on each side of my laptop and point them toward me for "spotlight" lighting when I do video calls as well as vanity lighting for doing makeup. They're also great for desk lighting or just as a reading light! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goggin

customer_reviews.title: Quality lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This Saicoo LED desktop lamp is perfect for my desk. It is very sturdy, the right height and can be adjusted to any desired position. The light brightness is adjustable from white to warm yellow, and also high to low. I keep it on bright white. I also like the USB charging port too. I did a lot of research upfront and I highly recommend this lamp. I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank - Augusta, GA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly amazing product! It allows complete customization, of brightness, color temperature and the placement and direction of the cd array. It turns on or off with a single touch. The nightlight would be too bright to my taste for sleeping but it's perfect for mood lighting. The outlet for charging a USB device is just icing on a very delicious cake. My only slight criticism is that the icons and captions for changing brightness and color temperature are unintuitive, but one learns how they work in a few moments so this is harmless.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, but falls over at extreme angles
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is much brighter than the lamp it replaces. The controls are awesome, too. I would have given it 5 stars, but there is one issue with my particular application. It requires an extreme angle and the base is not heavy enough to support the lamp at the needed angle. I had to add some Velcro strips under the lamp and on my desk to prevent tilting. Other than that, the lamp is great.
customer_reviews.author: peyitoyoco

customer_reviews.title: The BEST desk lamp I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! So versatile and flexible. I use my black one as a piano lamp and it turns all different ways so I can direct the light exactly where I need it. The light is bright but gentle on the eyes and can be used for long periods of time without stress or strain. I have a white one on my desk in the office as well. I absolutely swear by it. Perfect for reading and/or working at my computer. Thank you! Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Superheroperson

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not very flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. But a little unwieldy because the bottom portion of the arm is so long and fixed length.
customer_reviews.author: William Ender

customer_reviews.title: Problems with 1st lamp after less than a month. 2nd lamp better
customer_reviews.text: 1st review. Very nice table lamp with awesome controls for brightness and color. The only improvement I would suggest is a slight matte finish to the base. The glossly finish shows the dust and fingerprints. Gave it 4 stars. 2nd review. After less than a month, the color control did not work properly. The lamp was permanently on the soft white food mode. Pressing the read mode dimmed the light and did not change the color to bright white. I have returned the lamp and ordered another. Hopefully, it will be more reliable. Reduced rating to 3 stars. 3rd review. I've had the replacement lamp for two months and it has been working beautifully. Raised rating back to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sid T

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Truly remarkable lamp. Incredibly intuitive and very configurable. Only a few areas where it could use improvements: - USB port needs more power to support tablets and higher power devices - Need more than one USB port - Longer power cable I even found a way to use it with a headphone stand to save more space! See the pocture
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk lamp. Looks very modern and you can use the options to get just the right lighting you need for the job at hand. Wish it could expand out the light rays a little more but you can configure the arm to what ever position you desire. A bit expensive, but I have always believed you get what you pay for. Worth the extra few dollars as long as it performs as well a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: LuvDrones

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedside light while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bedside light that allowed color temperature changes. I gave this one a try and I'm very happy with it. Nice and easy to adjust and the night-light button is very handy if I have to get up at night. Update: 9/23/15. Well, it was a nice light. Unfortunately after about 3 months of use the warmer light panel died.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this lamp. It is pretty much what it claims to be with all of the amenities it claims to possess. I like the fact that you can change the color to warmer tones and I like the USB port that I use to charge my phone. I wish it provided more light. It's good - but not great. The entire lamp is also not as flexible or sturdy and I had hoped - so you have to be careful when adjusting or moving it. All in all I give it a B+.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Nice and solid and doesn't' hurt my eyes to look into the light. ;) It's heavy enough to actually USE on my desk where things can shoved around now and then and the light is Perfect for crafts and reading at my desk. I have several other brand floor digital lamps, but they can't ever give me the exact angle of light I need. This bad boy DOES! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Versatility is the name of the game
customer_reviews.text: This LED lamp is quite versatile; it is jointed (that was a big selling point, for me), it has adjustable color temps and brightness, and at 10 watts, it sheds plenty of light at a desk. I'm currently using it as a night light (indirect lighting), also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desk lamp I have ever had. All of the touch buttons work great and are very easy to use. There is a USB port on the side of the base that charges my phone very quickly. I love how I can adjust the color of the light, from light yellow, to hospital room white. The head rotates 180 degrees so you can have it face the ceiling if you want it to. Great buy, have never had a problem with it. Get this now.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!!
customer_reviews.text: Great light for zoom meetings, reading, morning coffee reading your email...
customer_reviews.author: Cat Corchado

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The touch controls are awesome. The light is bright enough to light up a dorm room for getting dressed but not so bright that it wakes up sleeping roommates. 4 stars because the power cord is slightly loose where it plugs into the back of the lamp and sometimes when sliding the lamp around on the table the power cord moves just a little bit, causing the light to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quality, very bright or very dim if needed, folds nicely, short cord.
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is exactly what I was looking for, gets plenty bright but more importantly for me as a twitch streamer gets dim enough using the sleep function to provide soft even lighting without being over powering being maybe a foot and a half from my face. If there is a down side all I can think of is the cord may be a tad short and the base doesn't rotate quite far enough. But I think it's a fine choice over a other LED panels that require a soft box to be usable at close distances.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk lamp. Right out of the box and onto my computer desk and it operates better than I expected. Multi-directional and the light can be as bright or as soft as my mood hits me. I love how the buttons are illuminated and I especially love the LED lighting. I never would have dreamed that I would get excited over a desk lamp until I bought this lamp. This lamp is worth every penny that I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Denoose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product....
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying another one for my wife's side of the bed... Great reading light with plenty of brightness settings. The USB for charging makes it nice to plug the kindle into. Only thing I didn't realize was the sleep mode is not a dimming mode, but more of a night light mode... I would have preferred a mode that slowly turned itself off...no biggy, I still ordered another one.. First review I have ever wrote for a product. Peace
customer_reviews.author: SLSG Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is amazing - I love it. It's not cheap like other crummy desk lamps. The controls are easy to use, the features are great, and the touch controls are surprisingly intuitive. I do like the fact you can change the color temperature - it makes switching from cold reading to warm ambient easy. Plus, it's fully articulated - it's not evident from the product photos, but this lamp can move and rotate every which way across several articulation points. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. I use it next to me drawing table. The brightness and warmth of light controls are great and the USB plug-in on the side is so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a boring traditional desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent desk light. It is as tall as my computer monitor which is exactly the right height for a desk lamp. The light it throws can vary and once you get it the way you like it you can preset it simply. It looks much more expensive then it is and has that 21st Century flavor that makes it the perfect alternative to a boring, traditional desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Scarinci

customer_reviews.title: We will probably end up getting another.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp!!!! Ever used it with the sleep setting (as night light) and the brightest(completely maxed out) paired with the book (completely maxed out). Love the bright natural light. Received it on February 25th, 2017 and set them up asap. Husband loved this light as well. We highly recommend this product. The box it came in was very nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: RaNiiTH

customer_reviews.title: Fine desk light
customer_reviews.text: A fine desk light. Puts light where I want it. The night light is a nice added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Home cook

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my third one of these
customer_reviews.text: Over the past year or so I've bought three of these. I use two at my desk, one where I do watercolor painting. It is a great daylight temperature LED lamp. I set two of them up in a copystand arrangement to take pictures of my paintings and the color fidelity is great. Definitely a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and function
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is the right size for my study desk; light-touch spots easily adjust intensity and coolness of light; the brightness potential is more than I need for reading and writing; light distribution is great; I regularly use the night light; the quality of materials used to make it is very good; design and function are excellent. I can't imagine how this lamp could have been made better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - fully adjustable. Well made. Sleek and modern. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so versatile -- I LOVE IT! It is as bright as you would possibly need for a desk/room. And you can adjust it to whatever type of lighting you want/need. Easy instructions. Very elegant and modern. Not a big footprint on my desk. I have the white one for my desk and I loved it so much I bought the black one for my husband's desk. I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I have four of these!
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these now.They never have a problem. I love the different light settings and the sleek modern look but most of all, I love the fact that it does not get hot. It stays cool no matter how long its on. So many ways to adjust the position of the light and you can set small things on the foot of it. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the choice between cool and warm light - I love the infinite choice of light intensity. I love the choice of figuing the position and direction of the light. The base was heavier than other reviews suggested which makes it more stable. I have it overhead on my computer desk and directed down on the desk - very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mullenix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I almost purchased one of those thin arm lamps but after looking at several reviews i noticed how flimsy and plasticy they looked. Not this lamp, This thing feels solid with lots of controls. Also its nice to plug in my phone when sitting at my computer. I couldnt reccomend this lamp enough.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyJ

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it is constructed and especially like the ...
customer_reviews.text: The light is as advertised. I like the way it is constructed and especially like the ability to change the temperature of the light in addition to the brightness level. It is also very easy to see the power switch in the dark as it is red until to you press it to energize the light. Once the light is on, the switch turns green. It provides the non-glaring light for my desk. The lamp is well built and not the least bit flimsy like the desk lamp this one replaced.
customer_reviews.author: WLS2585

customer_reviews.title: A Lot for Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is one of the best LED desk lamps I've seen and/or purchased. So many cool and useful features for the money. Great build, futuristic look, dimmable, color correctable and it moves into all kinds of positions. So versatile! Bought it as a study lamp for my daughter who is a teacher and her eye fatigue has disappeared. A really great product and a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sensor sensitivity, very very poor!!
customer_reviews.text: Sensor buttons on the bottom panel dont work like they suppose too. Takes couple of times tapping any button for it to work...example; when I try to power it on...it takes about 4 or 5 times me tapping on the button for it to turn on...and it's like that for all the other ones... sensor sensitivity is very very poor. Brightness and versatility good.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: You would be hard pressed to find a better lamp. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: awesome lamp! I looked at a lot of options that are well over $100 and this one is the winner. The temperature adjustment (for light color) is amazing. The brightness adjustment has an excellent range. The lamp itself has a large range of movement. I use this as a fly tying lamp and love it. It would be great for any desk-top work. It's also really nice as a light for photography with it's wide range of adjustments (I do a lot of close up photography of small items). Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Handsome & Useful
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much so far but wish the LED panel were rotatable on an additional sideways axis but this is just a quibble as the lamp performs well in it's present state of design and form. I seem to ALWAY eventually encounter power switch failures on ALL my previous LED desk lamps and hope the solid state electronic switch on this unit proves more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Liscia

customer_reviews.title: The best lighting you could ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: This desktop lamp is amazing! I love the multi-functional levels of lighting that I have to choose from plus being able to position the light in various ways so that I can make changes quickly and easily as the situation changes. It was packed extremely well protected. All I had to do was take it out of the box and plug it in. I definitely will be purchasing more lamps from the Saicoo Company as my other lamps need replaced. This is definitely one of the best purchases I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in an ITM Department at a bank so I am video chatting with customers daily. Love the brightness of this lamp. Wish that it could bend a little more but it will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The best desk lamp I have ever owned. Looks great, very high quality, easy to operate by just touching and holding the buttons. The rectangular light spreads the light over a large area of my desk without having the light shining in my eyes. To be able to adjust from white light to cool light is great to keep from eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Have since bought two
customer_reviews.text: I have since bought two, one for me and one for my wife. Maybe it's just me, but I don't think any lamp is bright enough. Other than that, this lamp is nicely designed and is a pleasure to look at. I usually just use the default setting; hardly use the hi/lo buttons, the coffee/reading buttons, or the sleep button. Well, it's kinda cool that those buttons are there just in case. Highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Saicoo LED Desktop Lamp with Large LED Panel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I would buy it again, and recommend it to anyone who's looking for something like this Works exactly like it should be not much to say about it! A little bit pricey. But the Perfection has its price I would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Laczko Studio

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine. I’d but a different one if I had the choice again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a light. Not sure it’s worth the price. It’s just a light
customer_reviews.author: BS Abstracts

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, minor issue
customer_reviews.text: The light is great. The lamp is solid. My only issue is the control buttons. I have to press them a few times to get them to work properly. It doesn't happen all the time, but often enough. Otherwise, I like the color control, from cool to warm. Great light. Would be better if they fix the intermittent button issue.
customer_reviews.author: RSolo

customer_reviews.title: adjustable and the color temperature adjustment is more useful than you would think
customer_reviews.text: The future of desk lighting, Bright, adjustable and the color temperature adjustment is more useful than you would think. I especially like how I can adjust the temperature to either my computers work space or other personal preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I brought 2 of these; one for wife and myself, I viewed the video about this item and was impressed by the features and the style. Quick delivery,open box and found no damages, strudy frame and quite elegant , works like a charm, glad I invested...Oh, I'm glad I followed my notion on getting 2, saved me the trouble of re-ordering, wife loves it........
customer_reviews.author: reggie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp far exceeded my expectations. I work in the IT field and spend most of my time performing monitoring and analysis at our almost dark room. You can adjust the intensity of the lamp, it doesn't generate any heat. You can actually touch the light! It completely quiet. I am planning to buy a second lamp for my home study room .
customer_reviews.author: Edgard Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Creative Use for Video/Zoom Conferences
customer_reviews.text: With Zoom conferences, this solved a problem with backlighting. It’s like Hollywood lighting in the front if you can’t rearrange your furniture to avoid backlighting.
customer_reviews.author: Mayor_Ed

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is amazing. The large surface light makes doing work or ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is amazing. The large surface light makes doing work or projects that require visibility of fine details possible. I use it for reading print documents for proofing/editing purposes. It doesn't need assembly, easy to use and has a USB port, which I really like. I am planning on purchasing another for use at home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jillane

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: I realize we are just talking about a desk lamp, but, this thing is absolutely awesome. First off, it looks for high quality and modern and will fit right into the most sleek setups. The light quality is really, really good. With the large light surface the light is nice and soft. And, there are options to switch the color of the light to a warmer glow like the older incandescent lights. And, it has a night light setting. I really love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalShopper

customer_reviews.title: IT HAS IT ALL
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lamp with a bold modern appearance and most importantly, excellent performance. I like its light variations from dim to bright, cold to warm and any combination in between. Definitely worth the money. Update: Just bought another one. The old one still works like new after three and a half years of moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light.
customer_reviews.text: Two light settings: work and relax. It also has a fine-tuning mode for both modes to get brightness just right. On and off button stays lit so easy to find in the dark. Beautiful piece of art on your desk. I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: nomiketyson

customer_reviews.title: Versitality- great design - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought! Love it wish it came in variety of colors- for every room!
customer_reviews.author: ronald j. gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is a steal at this price! Very well made and of highest quality. I absolutely love the design and functionality of it. The color is adjustable from cool blue to warm yellow. Brightmess control is smooth and precise. You can get absolutely the perfect light for any mood or need with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: PWB

customer_reviews.title: An excellent LED lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is a very good item. It is constructed well, provide a large amount of light and is a good prove. It has variable light intensities and differently lifting temperatures from warn to cool, (incandescent to outdoor).The styling is sleek and contemporary. It fits well in my office. I strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was great, good quality
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was great, good quality, beautiful design, until one morning the lamp had come on without anyone touching it. I just woke up and it was on... And for about another week it was fine after that until one afternoon, it wouldn't turn on or do anything at all... that was the last straw and I sent it back. Hoping the problems were lamp specific, I want to get another one, this time the mars lg (white) version of basically the same lamp from saicoo.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting but design needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is great. But, the lamp has a light base that requires you to hold it down while you adjust it. The power cord is also very short (about 3 feet), which makes limits how far the lamp can be from an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lamp For Office or Cube
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my work cube in a dark corner. The "hot/cool selections are great and its mobility is good. Its touch controls are easy and the range of light is seamless. And, its very cool look has caught the jealous eyes of co-workers. A bit more expensive than the typical desk lamp but worth every penny more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I understand you cannot make PERFECT product, but this one IMHO is 98% perfect
customer_reviews.text: I understand you cannot make PERFECT product, but this one IMHO is 98% perfect! Like it a lot. The only complain is it is to heavy on top... so the base should be made bit heavier - if you extended in tilted position it has tendency to fell down. I definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: observer

customer_reviews.title: "Elegance Personified"
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful, elegant and utilitarian lamp in the known universe! Its a feast for the eyes and absolutely perfect in that you can, with the flick of a finger, adjust the lamps appearance (Kelvin temperature, warm vs.cool look) It totally exceeded my expectations and I plan to buy more for family gifts - HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wester

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of the bulb, if you call it that, & that it "seamlessly" changes brightness & even color. (It has a pinker setting along w/ the bright white.) It's nice-looking & well-constructed. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kdiller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing desk lamp/makeup light
customer_reviews.text: I can't put into words how much I love this little lamp. I have one on my desk and one on my vanity. The light is bright but not blinding. The usb ports are great for charging my phone/tablet/Kindle. I love that you can adjust the brightness as well as adjust the kind of light from daylight to reading. Genius.
customer_reviews.author: allsmiles

customer_reviews.title: LED DESKTOP  LAMB
customer_reviews.text: The LED Desktop lamb is what I needed, due to issues were I'm currently staying. The room lighting is very poor, for the work I do mainly in the evening. This desktop lamp solved the problem 100%. The thing is that the product photos need to show the AC/DC converter, as I ordered a new power strip with order it wasn't problem.
customer_reviews.author: steven w

customer_reviews.title: A Greast Source of Light!
customer_reviews.text: This light is fantastic! It puts out a great deal of light, but with soft shadows due to its defused light panel. The functions are great as well, and easy to use by simply placing your fingertip on the selected button, and watching the light change to your liking. It's also very easy to put the light where you need it with its four positioning points. I use my Saicoo for building and painting very small objects, and its bright soft light, and easy of positioning makes it a perfect choice for me!
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken - Now Just A Hassle
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Now it just becomes a headache I've bought instead. What I needed today for work had to be repackaged up, and now has to be driven to a return dropoff location. Replacement won't be here for days. I am pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I simply love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this lamp. Sturdy, great adjustable settings on the light and the touch controls are great. The more I use these the better they get. I'm finding the ability to adjust light temperature and brightness extremely useful. I purchased two more for use in the studio. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp, High and Low light, Warm and Cool white light.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Lamp! This has so many settings I can have a very bright light for reading, or low and cool for evening. I can point it away from my face, directly on the book for less eye strain. It's great to be able to have practically any position I want for the space I'm in. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Staib

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my dad for building models and such, and so far he really likes it. Brighter and a lot less harsh on the eyes than a traditional desk lamp. Thinking about getting one for myself and, from what my dad has said, it's definitely worth getting one if you're thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great desk lamp , I really like the temperature control.It gives you the choice of what kind of light you want to have and how bright. The light is more flexible than it appears also. I looked at many different lamps and I am happy with my decision to buy this one. I can't speak for the longevity , I just purchased it 2 weeks ago, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: David Hronowski

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the softer warm light
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth your money. This lamp is everything you could want and then some. I enjoy the softer warm light. The USB port is a nice feature, perhaps in future models they might consider adding two or three more. I have recommended this lamp to others and they like it as well. The only issue I have had with it is the base seems to be a tad bit light weight and can tip if you put the lamp in an awkward angle facing backwards.
customer_reviews.author: L. Patnaude

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp almost anywhere in your home.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can dim it, change the color of light, it has a clean design and is easy to move from one place to another.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gail Lasky

customer_reviews.title: The dimming and light color controls work fine and it is nice to have a USB charging ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp to replace an older halogen, gooseneck lamp that stopped working. I have had the lamp for a week now and it performs as advertised. The dimming and light color controls work fine and it is nice to have a USB charging port on my desktop. I especially like the multiple ways you can adjust the head of the lamp to direct the light exactly where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: bbqjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: I like the light, love the features and works well. Adjusting the temperature is very helpful into the evening. Just wish the arm was either taller or could rotate a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: sktaka18322

customer_reviews.title: The right light for hobbyists!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. The light is bright and controllable. I have not found any problems angling the light to my needs. I just set the color and leave it. This is the best desk light I have ever owned and recommend it to anyone. I am a hobbyist and it works really well to illuminate tricky projects.
customer_reviews.author: Love those Aussies!

customer_reviews.title: We love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Someone has put some serious thought into the design and function of this lamp. The controls are intuitive, the Light output has infinite levels and it the physical adjustments allow the user to direct the light at an angle that is most convent for the task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: David Bosard

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like being able to set the color temperature and brightness to what best fits the moment. The night light is also a nice benefit of this lamp. The lamp is also a very clean and modern looking product. I will likely be buying some more of these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is exactly as described. It came extremely well packed. It is quite bright and you can change the color temperature to suit your needs. It is adjustable in several directions. The black glass base looks very nice, not cheap. The light does not flicker at all.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Lamp that...wait for it... Vibrates... ;)
customer_reviews.text: I'm really am enjoying the product, the flexibility of how the light can be adjusted is better then most. What I didn't realize until I received the unit is that the control buttons (which glow green) employee a haptic feedback mechanism (small vibration) when you reach the end of the set points. Example being the base unit vibrates when the minimum and maximum dimming settings are achieved. For the price, I'm not sure there's a better desk lamp available?
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is an electrician and has access to many ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an electrician and has access to many different types of lights. I was surprised when he wanted me to order this for him through Amazon. He loves the brightness and all the features that comes with it and their functions. He gives this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Allegiance

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchase I've made! recommend to anyone looking for a desk or reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wish the touch buttons had a texture so I could find them in the dark but otherwise a very solid and well designed desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I concur with the other reviewers. This is a quality lamp and very easy on the eyes. It's a bit top heavy so you can't extend the lamp to extreme positions or it may tip. Considering the benefits, great lamp. I'm very pleased with my purchase. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The desk lamp works just fine it's a good lamb except there's a flaw in ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk lamp works just fine it's a good lamb except there's a flaw in the plastic the plastic has a big round circle that looks like someone took a Brillo pad to it and then try to color it in with a black felt marking pen. I am writing an ammended review about this lamp, The lamp is quite good and the customer service department was really nice about, wanting to replace, the lamp because of the flaw, They also said they would refund me $10.00 for my inconvenience, good customer service. I am going to give them 5 stars because they were very kind and helpfull . Thanks Fiona.............
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richards

product_meta.title: Saicoo Led Desktop Lamp with Large Led Panel, Seamless Dimming Control of Brightness and Color Temperature, an USB Charging Port, for Video Conference Talk
feature_bullets: Apply to All Scenes: Seamless Mode Control: Seamless dimming control of brightness and color temperature (2700K- 6500K) with countless levels and combinations, ideal for work, reading, relax, sleep and more.
Special Eye-Care LED: Large-sized LED panel (7.4 inch) with special light-reflection design generates soft, non-flickering light.
Easy Touch-Sensitive Manipulate: Controls over power, lightness, color temperature, sleep are all done button-free on the touch-sensitive panel.
Most-Flexible Angles: 5 adjustable points let you adjust the lamp with almost any position you'd like, from up to down, front to back .
What You Get: Saicoo LED Desktop Lamp, UL listed power adapter, user manual, 12-month warranty and lifetime technical support.

specifications.Special Features: Seamless dimming control of brightness and color temperature
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars575 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
